latest news.eng_title: Do Fundamentals Have Any Role To Play In Driving Tethys Petroleum Limited's (CVE:TPL) Stock Up Recently?
latest news.summary: Tethys Petroleum's (CVE:TPL) stock has risen by 4.3% over the past month, but its Return on Equity (ROE) of 7.4% is lower than the industry average of 9.6%. Despite this, the company has seen exceptional 44% net income growth over the past five years. The company's management has made some good strategic decisions, or it has a low payout ratio, which could be contributing to this growth. The investor should try to establish if the expected growth or decline in earnings is priced in, as this will give an idea if the stock is headed into clear blue waters or if swampy waters await. Tethys Petroleum has a high rate of reinvestment, albeit at a low ROE, which has managed to see a considerable growth in its earnings.
latest news.title: Do Fundamentals Have Any Role To Play In Driving Tethys Petroleum Limited's (CVE:TPL) Stock Up Recently?

latest news.eng_title: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider

latest news.eng_title: Cryo-Cell Announces 2024 Annual Meeting of Shareholders

Organization: United States Securities and Exchange Commission

latest news.summary: Cryo-Cell International Inc. (NYSE American: CCEL), a leader in cryopreservation services, announced that its 2024 Annual Meeting of Shareholders will be held on October 29, 2024. According to a recent document filed with the SEC, the record date for shareholders entitled to receive notice and vote at the meeting will be September 20, 2024. The company outlined the requirements for shareholders who wish to submit proposals or nominate directors at the Annual Meeting, stating that they must submit the necessary communication by the 10th calendar day following the public disclosure of the meeting date. This announcement is part of the company's routine governance, allowing shareholders to interact with the company's management and participate in important decisions, such as the election of board members and other corporate matters. The company has also made available a copy of its amended bylaws, which can be found in the Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission on December 11, 2018.
latest news.title: Cryo-Cell fissa l'assemblea annuale per il 29 ottobre Da Investing.com

latest news.eng_title: Cryo-Cell Sets Annual Meeting Date for October 29, 2024
latest news.summary: Cryo-Cell International Inc., a leader in cryopreservation services, announced that its Annual Meeting of Shareholders 2024 will be held on October 29, 2024. The company revealed in a recent SEC filing that the record date for shareholders entitled to notice and vote at the meeting will be September 20, 2024. According to the company's bylaws, shareholders wishing to present matters or nominate directors must submit the appropriate notice by no later than the 10th calendar day following the public disclosure of the meeting date, which is the first day these details were made public. This announcement is part of the company's corporate governance routine, allowing shareholders to interact with management and participate in important decisions, such as electing board members and other business matters.
latest news.title: Cryo-Cell fixe son assemblée annuelle au 29 octobre Par Investing.com

latest news.eng_title: U.S. crude stockpiles rose 1.9M barrels last week, API says
latest news.summary: The American Petroleum Institute reported a build of 1.96M barrels of oil in U.S. commercial stockpiles for the week ending September 13. Gasoline inventories showed a build of 2.34M barrels, while distillate inventories showed a build of 2.3M barrels. However, stockpiles at the Cushing, Oklahoma, storage hub showed a draw of 1.4M barrels. Analysts surveyed by The Wall Street Journal forecast commercial crude stocks will decline by 1M barrels, gasoline inventories will increase by 600K barrels, and distillates will increase by 300K barrels. The current price of October WTI crude oil is $71.17/bbl.
latest news.title: U.S. crude stockpiles rose 1.9M barrels last week, API says

latest news.eng_title: Cyber Firm Reports SEC's Final Rule Language Causing 10-K Filer Missteps
latest news.summary: A recent survey by HALOCK Security Labs and Reasonable Risk found that the SEC's new cybersecurity requirements are causing confusion among executives at public companies. The survey report reveals that many 10-K filings make implausible claims that companies do not foresee a risk that cybersecurity incidents may cause material impacts. According to Jim Mirochnik, CEO of Reasonable Risk, non-technical executives often lack the necessary information to make informed decisions about cybersecurity initiatives. The survey also found that companies are conflating compliance standards with risk management, suggesting that their risk and governance programs are rooted in controls compliance rather than risk. As Chris Cronin, the Report's Lead Editor, noted, 'It is implausible that so many companies conducted risk assessments and found no potentially material risks.' The SEC is challenging corporate leadership to take a more active role in their organization's accountability and transparency in risk management.
latest news.title: Cyber Firm Reports SEC's Final Rule Language Causing 10-K Filer Missteps

latest news.eng_title: Rathbones Group PLC Has $853,000 Holdings in Occidental Petroleum Co. (NYSE:OXY)

(NYSE:OXY) by 5.5% during the 2nd quarter, according to the company in its most recent filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The institutional investor owned 13,540 shares of the oil and gas producer's stock after selling 795 shares during the quarter. Berkshire Hathaway Inc boosted its position in Occidental Petroleum by 8.7% in the fourth quarter. The company also recently announced a quarterly dividend, which will be paid on Tuesday, October 15th. Shareholders of record on Tuesday, September 10th will be issued a $0.22 dividend. Research analysts predict that Occidental Petroleum Co. will post 3.71 EPS for the current year. The company's oil and gas segment explores for, develops, and produces oil and condensate, natural gas liquids (NGLs), and natural gas. 88.70% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors. Insider Transactions at Occidental Petroleum In related news, major shareholder Petroleum Corp /De/ Occidental sold 19,500,000 shares of the firm's stock in a transaction on Wednesday, August 14th. The stock was sold at an average price of $35.75, for a total transaction of $697,125,000.00. Following the sale, the insider now owns 165,681,578 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $5,923,116,413.50.
latest news.title: Rathbones Group PLC Has $853,000 Holdings in Occidental Petroleum Co. (NYSE:OXY)

latest news.eng_title: New Filing Deadlines For Schedule 13G Effective September 30
latest news.summary: The SEC has introduced new rules for Schedule 13G filings, which will now be due on a quarterly basis instead of annually. The new deadlines require initial Schedule 13G filings within 45 days after the end of the quarter in which a qualified institutional investor (QII) or exempt investor exceeds the 5% threshold, or within five business days of crossing the 5% threshold for passive investors. QIIs whose beneficial ownership exceeds 10% must file within five business days of the end of the month. The new rules also require that all Schedule 13G filings be amended within 45 days after the end of the quarter in which any material change occurs. The SEC has declined to add a specific materiality threshold to Rule 13d-2(b), and Schedule 13G filers will need to evaluate whether a change in information is 'material' using the standard definition of materiality under the Federal securities laws. As a result of the new quarterly deadline, initial and amended 13G filings must be filed by 10 p.m. Eastern time on Thursday, November 14 for filers reporting material changes since last 13G filing or QIIs or exempt filers filing their initial 13Gs.
latest news.title: New Filing Deadlines For Schedule 13G Effective September 30

news knowledge.eng_title: VSee Health, Inc. Receives Nasdaq Notice Regarding Delayed Form 10-Q Filing
news knowledge.summary: VSee Health, Inc. received a notice from Nasdaq stating that the company is not in compliance with Nasdaq's listing rule 5250(c)(1) due to not filing its Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q for the period ended June 30, 2024. The company has until November 5, 2024 to submit a plan to regain compliance and has the option to file the Form 10-Q by February 18, 2025 if Nasdaq accepts the plan. The company intends to take necessary steps to regain compliance and file the report as soon as practicable. 'The Company intends to take the necessary steps to regain compliance with Nasdaq's listing rules and file the Form 10-Q as soon as practicable,' according to the company. The company's ability to regain compliance within the required timeframe is subject to various risks and uncertainties, as stated in its most recent Annual Report on Form 10-K and other documents filed with the SEC.
news knowledge.title: VSee Health, Inc. Receives Nasdaq Notice Regarding Delayed Form 10-Q Filing

news knowledge.eng_title: Capstone Green Energy Files Third Quarter Fiscal 2024 Form 10-Q

Organization: United States Securities and Exchange Commission
Title: Chief Financial Officer
Chief Executive Officer
President

news knowledge.summary: Capstone Green Energy Holdings, Inc. has filed its quarterly report on Form 10-Q for the quarter ended December 31, 2023, with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The company's Chief Financial Officer, John Juric, stated, 'Filing this latest Form 10-Q is the next step in our ongoing journey toward full compliance with SEC reporting requirements.' The company's President and Chief Executive Officer, Vince Canino, added, 'We see the tremendous tailwinds that are upon us as power becomes a premium. Our approach not only solves the energy trilemma of resiliency, sustainability and affordability on a life cycle cost basis, but we do it whilst sustainably lowering the carbon footprint.' The company expects to be eligible to obtain a quotation of its common stock on the OTC Pink Sheet Market once it completes its filings for Fiscal Year 2024 and Fiscal 2025 quarterly filings.
news knowledge.title: Capstone Green Energy Files Third Quarter Fiscal 2024 Form 10-Q

news knowledge.eng_title: Super Micro Computer, Inc. to Delay Form 10-K Filing for Fiscal Year 2024
news knowledge.summary: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (NASDAQ: SMCI) announced that it will not timely file its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2024. The company expects to file a Notification of Late Filing on Form 12b-25 on August 30, 2024. According to the company, additional time is needed to complete its assessment of the design and operating effectiveness of its internal controls over financial reporting as of June 30, 2024. The company has not updated its results for the fiscal year and quarter ended June 30, 2024, which were announced in a press release dated August 6, 2024. The company's management is still working on completing its assessment, and the company is unable to file its Annual Report within the prescribed time period without unreasonable effort or expense. 'Additional time is needed for SMCI's management to complete its assessment of the design and operating effectiveness of its internal controls over financial reporting as of June 30, 2024,' the company stated. The company's stock is listed on the NASDAQ under the ticker symbol SMCI.
news knowledge.title: Super Micro Computer, Inc. to Delay Form 10-K Filing for Fiscal Year 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Direct Digital Holdings Announces Receipt Of Anticipated Additional Delinquency Notice
news knowledge.summary: Direct Digital Holdings, Inc. (the 'Company') received an additional delinquency notice from the Listing Qualifications Department of The Nasdaq Stock Market LLC ('Nasdaq') on August 21, 2024, due to the delay in filing its Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q for the period ended June 30, 2024. The Company had previously submitted a plan to regain compliance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5250(c)(1) by filing its Annual Report on Form 10-K and its Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q for the quarter ended March 31, 2024, with the SEC by October 14, 2024. Nasdaq has now requested an update to the plan, particularly with respect to the Company's plan to file the Q2 Form 10-Q with the SEC. The Company plans to timely update Nasdaq with respect to the plan by September 5, 2024. The Company continues to work diligently to complete and file the delayed reports with the SEC and thereby evidence compliance with the Rule as soon as practicable. The notice does not have an immediate effect on the listing or trading of the Company's securities on Nasdaq. The Company's forward-looking statements are subject to certain risks, trends, and uncertainties, including but not limited to, the restrictions and covenants imposed upon the Company by its credit facilities, its ability to secure additional financing to meet its capital needs, and the difficulty in identifying and integrating any future acquisitions or strategic investments.
news knowledge.title: Direct Digital Holdings Announces Receipt Of Anticipated Additional Delinquency Notice

news knowledge.eng_title: What Late SEC Filers Need To Know In 2024
news knowledge.summary: Companies that fail to file their SEC reports on time may face severe consequences, including delisting from stock exchanges, trading halts, and potential revocation of their registration under the Exchange Act. The SEC requires companies to file annual and quarterly reports on Forms 10-K and 10-Q, respectively, within specific deadlines. If a company misses a deadline, it must file a Form 12b-25 within one business day, disclosing its inability to file the report timely and the reason for the delay. The company then has 15 calendar days to file the required report, or 30 calendar days for a Form 10-K or 20-F. Failure to file the report within the extended time period may result in delisting. Companies listed on the NYSE or NASDAQ must also issue a press release announcing the failure to file timely a periodic report with the SEC. The SEC may suspend trading in the company's securities for up to 10 trading days or institute an administrative proceeding against the late filer. Companies that have previously relied on Form S-3 or Form F-3 for shelf registrations and have become ineligible to utilize these forms due to late filings may not be able to file a new registration statement for at least 12 months from the original filing due date. The SEC provides exceptions for certain Form 8-K disclosure items, but failure to file timely under other items will result in a loss of Form S-3 eligibility.
news knowledge.title: What Late SEC Filers Need To Know In 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Trimble to Update and Reconvene 2024 Annual Meeting
news knowledge.summary: Trimble Inc. has announced that it will update and reconvene its 2024 annual meeting due to delays in filing the revised annual report. The original report was filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on February 26, 2024. The company has undergone an in-depth review by Ernst & Young LLP (EY), which is expected to be completed within the next month. According to Trimble's management, no errors have been found that would require a re-determination of the consolidated financial statements, and EY has not withdrawn the audit report included in the original Form 10-K. Due to the imminent completion of the review procedures, Trimble intends to update its annual meeting scheduled for August 14, 2024, and reconvene it on September 30, 2024, at 10:00 AM (Mountain Time), via remote communication. The company expects to file the revised Form 10-K with the SEC by that date. Registered shareholders as of April 1, 2024, can vote at the reconvened annual meeting. Proxies already submitted will be valid for the new meeting date unless revoked. Shareholders who have voted do not need to take further action unless they wish to change their vote. Those who wish to change their vote can do so online or by phone until 11:59 PM (Eastern Time) on September 29, 2024, or virtually during the meeting.
news knowledge.title: Trimble riconvocherà l'assemblea annuale del 2024 dopo il completamento della revisione contabile Da Investing.com

news knowledge.eng_title: GWTI's Stock Converted from Trading on OTCQB to Pink Sheet Trading
news knowledge.summary: Greenway Technologies, Inc. (OTC: GWTI) has switched from trading on the OTCQB to pink sheet trading due to late SEC filings. The company has now filed its 2023 Form 10-K and expects to file its Form 10-Q for the quarter ended March 31, 2024 next week. After submitting the Form 10-Q, Greenway must request an exemption from FINRA to resume trading on the OTCQB. Greenway is a gas-to-liquids and gas-to-hydrogen technology development company based in Arlington, Texas. The company's patented technology has been integrated into its first-generation commercial G-Reformer unit, which can convert natural gas into synthesis gas and produce fuels and chemicals.
news knowledge.title: GWTI's Stock Converted from Trading on OTCQB to Pink Sheet Trading

news knowledge.eng_title: PowerFleet : FORM 12b-25 NOTIFICATION OF LATE FILING
news knowledge.summary: Powerfleet, Inc. has filed a notification with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) stating that it will not be able to file its Transition Report on Form 10-K for the transition period from January 1, 2024 to March 31, 2024 by the original due date of July 22, 2024. The company expects to file the report within the 15-day extension period provided under Rule 12b-25 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The delay is due to additional time required to complete the financial statement close process, including compiling and reviewing information related to the company's business combination with MiX Telematics Ltd.
news knowledge.title: PowerFleet : FORM 12b-25 NOTIFICATION OF LATE FILING
